Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10000 to us. To make this opportunity more attractive to you, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider this proposal promptly. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
